head.supplied: 26/7/96. ¶ ¶ Kindly say, dear Mr Macdonald, whether you received also the volume of the recent geographic Congress in Rome. I have some idea, that we both subscribed to this Congress, but am not sure...

div.p: A38, Royal Geographical Society of Australasia (Victorian Branch), Mitchell Library, State Library of New South Wales, Sydney.

Kindly say, dear Mr Macdonald, whether you received also the volume of the recent geographic Congress in Rome. I have some idea, that we both subscribed to this Congress, but am not sure. I think you did, but perhaps none of our Colleagues of the Council. You would then of course be entitled to your copy.

I met the Governor at the Prahran Ball, when he said that on arrival of the antarctic party we would be invited to the "Sunbeam".
The private yacht of the then Governor of Victoria, Lord Brassey.
Let me hope that you are happy and well.
